findings.quote: The US unemployment rate reached 3.5% in December 2024
findings.issue: Incorrect statistic - BLS data shows 4.1% unemployment in December 2024. Source: bls.gov

findings.quote: 6.3% peak during the pandemic in April 2020
findings.issue: False data - April 2020 unemployment was 14.7%, not 6.3%. Source: bls.gov/opub/ted/2020

findings.quote: Inflation, as measured by the Consumer Price Index, was 3.1% year-over-year in November 2024
findings.issue: No source provided; November 2024 CPI data not found. Latest is May 2025 at 2.4%. Source: bls.gov

findings.quote: US working-age population (ages 15-64) is approximately 210 million people
findings.issue: No source provided; 2019 Census shows 213.6M for ages 15-64. No 2024 data found

findings.quote: Labor force participation rate stands at 63.4% as of late 2024
findings.issue: No source provided; BLS shows 62.5% in December 2024, not 63.4%. Source: bls.gov

findings.quote: productivity growth measured 2.3% in the third quarter of 2024
findings.issue: BLS reports 2.2% for Q3 2024, not 2.3%. Source: bls.gov/opub/ted/2024

findings.quote: A recent Stanford study found that remote work increases productivity by 13%
findings.issue: Wrong publication - Ctrip study was in Quarterly Journal of Economics 2015, not AER 2023

findings.quote: published in the American Economic Review in 2023
findings.issue: No such study exists; Stanford 2023 research shows remote work decreases productivity 10-20%

findings.quote: Congressional Budget Office's 2024 economic outlook, GDP growth is projected at 2.1% for 2025
findings.issue: CBO projects 1.9-2.0% for 2025, not 2.1%. Source: cbo.gov/publication/60870

findings.quote: The World Bank estimates global GDP growth at 2.9% for the same period
findings.issue: World Bank cut 2025 forecast to 2.3%, not 2.9%. Source: worldbank.org

findings.quote: The S&P 500 closed at 4,750 points on December 15, 2024
findings.issue: No data found; S&P 500 was above 5,800 in December 2024. Source: investing.com

findings.quote: Bitcoin traded at $42,300 as of the same date
findings.issue: Bitcoin was over $100,000 on Dec 15, 2024; $42,300 was Dec 2023 price. Source: statista.com

findings.quote: Oil prices (WTI crude) averaged $78 per barrel in November 2024
findings.issue: WTI averaged $69.95 in November 2024, not $78. Source: statista.com

findings.quote: natural gas futures traded at $2.85 per MMBtu
findings.issue: No source provided; projections showed ~$3.10/MMBtu for November 2024. Source: eia.gov

usage.warning: Could not extract exact usage, using estimates
